In remarks to reporters before the hearing began, Jerry Brown said the redevelopment proposal is integral to his overall strategy to permanently put the state back on sound financial footing. This package only works with taxes, spending cuts and realignment, he said.`` Recapturing the property tax for its primarily intended purpose will save the state money because the things you do at the local level you can do more efficiently.'' Michael Jordan 's move worked: Jrue Holiday had 15 points, seven rebounds and six assists. He just put us in a good rhythm tonight and had us flowing, Allen Iverson said. You always have to feel http://wn.com/Allen_Iverson_26pts_Melo_38pts_vs_Sonics_KDurant_37pts_07/08_NBA Touted rookies Kevin Durant and Jeff Kollman Green both had career-best efforts for the Seattle SuperSonics and damaged the Denver Nuggets' postseason aspirations. Kevin Durant , the second- overall pick in last year's draft and the leading candidate for rookie of the year, scored a season-high 37 points and Green, the fifth pick, had a season-high 35 to lead the Sonics to a 151-147 double-overtime victory over Denver on Sunday night.`` My teammates were making plays and I was just there finishing them, Green said. The loss kept the Nuggets( 46-31) in a tie with Golden State for the eighth and final playoff spot in the Western Conference. The Warriors lost to New Orleans, 108-96, earlier Sunday
